text: O.B. Grant House is a historic home located at Ridgway in Elk County, Pennsylvania. It was built in 1870 in the Italianate style. It is a two-story, balloon-frame dwelling resting on a stone foundation and capped by an intersecting gable roof. Note: This includes and It was added to the National Register of Historic Places in 2004. ==References== Category:Houses on the National Register of Historic Places in Pennsylvania Category:Italianate architecture in Pennsylvania Category:Houses completed in 1870 Category:Houses in Elk County, Pennsylvania Category:National Register of Historic Places in Elk County, Pennsylvania
title: O.B. Grant House
